name: Time's up (shinrak)
description:
Time's up is a very short puzzle platformer developed in 3h for the Trijam #121.

In spacetime, time is merged with space into a single construct. This means, time has its own direction, and in this game... time's up! While you can move through space with your left and right controls, you can also move through time with the up and down keys. Reach the end of all levels and explore this strange corner of spacetime!

Credits

  • Music "Robot Dance" by Gruber from Pico-8 Tunes Vol. 2
  • Title font Ethnocentric by Typodermic Fonts
